36.ara-name: كتاب الزهد عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Anas bin Malik narrated from Abu Talhah who said:"We complained to the Messenger of Allah(s.a.w) of hunger and we raised(our garments ) from our stomachs (exposing) a stone (on each of us). So the Messenger of Allah(s.a.w) raised (his garment exposing) two stones

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي مَعِيشَةِ أَصْحَابِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Subsistence Of The Companions Of The Prophet (ﷺ) And His Family
